replies.body:
Tbh disappointed that I can't just pay $50 or something for the Popstar Kai'Sa skin. Instead I have to play 179 games with an S rank and win within 6 weeks. Which is absolutely freaking impossible.

The fact that I have to choose either that or the championship chromas etc. is actually really appaling. I'd have to pay around $600 to get everything I want. Riot, what are you thinking? I've already spent $8700AUD on this account.

I do agree the prices are ridiculous, especially for poor people like myself, It's really depressing. The amount of games required is an out rage, nobody has the freaking time to do what they're asking.

I'm still going to put in $60 towards the event (Pass + Orb/Token bundle) but It's still ridiculous, I probably shouldn't even do it tbh.
WAIT WTF DOES THAT MEANS THAT BUY DOING ALL THE MISSION U STILL CANT GET THE GOLDEN CHROMA??? THIS IS OUTRAGEOUS!!!{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

Riot has confirmed some hidden missions, so I'm going to assume this makes up the difference. It also bumps up the total tokens gained from free missions to 400 from 360.
Source: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/qnQEcmMV-worlds-2018-missions-rp-and-tokens-the-math
This rewards system is horrific, Riot has been doing more of this type of shit over the last couple years and it's seriously stupid.

It's not as bad as it used to be. After Lunar Revel I think, they made it so players don't have to pay to get missions and rewards. The last time I seen them introduce a pass was in Arcade Week, which I had a blast with it, but now the worlds pass is crazily rewarding. So much so, I wouldn't be at all satisfied without one.

The only thing I'll complain about is that after getting all the tokens I could possibly get, I'd need around a measly 40 to get a chroma..
However people with the pass would have almost 10 weeks to get all the tokens they like, and probably get nearly all the rewards.

360 tokens in total? A sad tease.. Why can't I just have a single chroma for all the time I would spend doing the missions? It's not like I get the border with it. If I wanted 40 tokens to get that chroma, then I would be able to get 10x the loot if I bought the pass to get that measly 40 tokens.

When will token drops from hextech chests be enabled again? I so badly want to open my 9 chests I have stashed up so I don't miss out on all but one of limited loot in an event like I always do.

I actually suspect that the total is not 360 tokens, but 330! I just received 5 tokens from the 'Go SKT!' mission (which is among the Week 1 missions), instead of the 10 tokens that were listed on here. This leads me to believe that Riot has mislabelled every mission 3rd from the top in Weeks 1-6, so what should happen is this:

* ALL missions in Weeks 1-6 that you get the whole week to complete give 5 tokens
* ALL missions in Weeks 1-6 that you get a short period (2-3 days) to complete give 10 tokens.


This lowers the total from 360 to 330, how BS this that? I actually liked the Odyssey event, but then they followed it up with this crap. NOT a happy camper. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

The tokens listed should be correct. If you believe you haven't received the right amount of tokens for a mission, submit a ticket to player support and they'll be able to look into it for you: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Odyssey could have been good.. But they really messed it up in a handful of ways. Mainly the missions together with matchmaking.
